definition: lit. not to stop until one reaches the Yellow River (idiom)/fig. to persevere until one reaches one's goal/to keep going while some hope is left
pinyin: bu4 dao4 Huang2 He2 xin1 bu4 si3

definition: lit. even jumping into the Yellow River can't get you clean/fig. to become inexorably mixed up/mired in controversy/in deep trouble
pinyin: tiao4 jin4 Huang2 He2 xi3 bu4 qing1

definition: Yellow River Cantata (1939) by Xian Xinghai 冼星海[Xian3 Xing1 hai3]

sentences.english: Our mother and the Yellow River, north of the city from its flowing.
sentences.chinese: 我们的母亲和黄河，也从它的城北流过。

sentences.english: There is a great potential of developing the agriculture relying on the Yellow River by exploiting the resource of land in Yinbei, Ningxia.
sentences.chinese: 开发银北土地资源，是宁夏发展黄河农业的潜力所在。

sentences.english: The river is yellow because of high content of sand in the water.
sentences.chinese: 黄河水因高含沙量而成黄色。

sentences.english: Numerous heroes lived on both sides of the Yellow River.
sentences.chinese: 黄河两岸诞生了无数的英雄豪杰。

sentences.english: Former minister of Ministry of Water Resources Zhang Zhenhuai praises the school as "the cradle of Yellow River technical leaders".
sentences.chinese: 水利部原部长杨振怀赞誉学院为“黄河技干摇篮”。

sentences.english: Machang is situated at the central uplift zone in Dongpu seg abundant in natural gas in the southern area of the Yellow River.
sentences.chinese: 东濮凹陷黄河南地区具有丰富的天然气资源。

sentences.english: Like the Yellow River,time keeps rolling along.
sentences.chinese: 时间像黄河一样不断滚滚奔腾向前。

sentences.english: We live near the Yellow River.
At present the company's core are the middle road and Jinan - Qingdao Yellow River Bridge.
sentences.chinese: 目前公司的核心路产是济青高速和黄河二桥。

sentences.english: Huanghe is the cradle of Chinese culture.
sentences.chinese: 黄河是中国文化的发源地。

sentences.english: Three ecological sub-zones are delineated on the basis of years of land.
sentences.chinese: 根据成陆年龄，将黄河三角洲划分为不同的生态亚区。

sentences.english: The Yellow River becomes a continental river in low-water seasons.
sentences.chinese: 在枯水期，黄河也成了“内陆河”了。

sentences.english: The idea of his harnessing of the river embodied Zhou Fu's concept of attaching great importance to agriculture.
sentences.chinese: 治理黄河本身体现了周馥重视农业的思想。

sentences.english: In summer we usually find Huanghe River full of waters.
sentences.chinese: 夏天我们通常发现水满黄河。

sentences.english: The evolution process of the Hualong Basin, one of fault basins in the upper reaches of the Yellow River .
sentences.chinese: 黄河上游的化隆盆地在第三纪期间为古湖占据。

sentences.english: The boundary between Shanxi and Shaanxi is the Huanghe River.
sentences.chinese: 山西和陕西以黄河为界。

definition: Huai River, main river of east China, between the Yellow River 黃河|黄河[Huang2 He2] and the Changjiang 長江|长江[Chang2 Jiang1]
Wei River in Shaanxi through the Guanzhong 關中|关中[Guan1 zhong1] plain
Ji River, former river of north-eastern China which disappeared after the Yellow River flooded in 1852
Wei River in Shaanxi through the Guanzhong 關中|关中 plain
Liao River of northeast China, passing through Inner Mongolia, Hebei, Jilin and Liaoning
old road/old way/old course (of a river)
Bohai Sea, or Bo Hai, between Liaoning and Shandong/Parhae, Korean kingdom in Manchuria and Siberia 698-926
